settings.title: Specification
settings.content:
Dimension: 11" to 45"

Maximum Load: 6.6 lbs

Material: Aluminum alloy and stainless steel

Color: Black

settings.title: HANDS-FREE
settings.text: Set up from field-side and you're good to go. Enjoy the game while recording on its own.

settings.title: EASY CLOUD STORAGE
settings.text: Save on phone storage by automatically sending recorded footage to the cloud.

settings.title: SHARE EXCITING MOMENTS
settings.text: Easily share your live streams or recordings in HD online or with friends.

settings.title: MULTIPLE PLAYERS TRACKING
settings.text: Through intelligent analysis of any sports game, Focos automatically selects key players to follow.

settings.title: FAR DISTANCE TRACKING
settings.text: Focos is capable of tracking the target from a few feet to more than 160 feet away, suitable to myriad of outdoor environments.

settings.title: AUTO ZOOM IN/OUT
settings.text: Through game analysis and smart perception of distance, Focos automatically zooms in and out to always capture the best views of a game.

settings.title: PORTABLE
settings.text: This portable, lightweight item is the best phone gimbal on the market – soon to become your favorite accessory!

settings.title: SHARE WITH ANYONE
settings.text: Share your best shot on social media, send a link to your family, or email your highlights to a scout.

settings.title: WIDE COMPATIBILITY
settings.text: Focos supports iPhone 11, 12, and 13 Series up to 1080P and iPhone XR, XS, XS Max, and SE (2nd Gen) up to 720P.

settings.title: What is Blink Focos?
settings.answer: Blink Focos is a smart tracking system designed for sports enthusiasts and their families. We can turn an iPhone into a fully automated camera to capture team sports with ease. Simple put your iPhone on our gimbal, along with Blink Focos App together, the system can automatically follow, record and live stream sports games like basketball and soccer games, with minimum interventions.

settings.title: How does Blink Focos follow and track?
settings.answer: The video footage captured by an iPhone are analyzed by Blink Focos App based on the movements of players as well as the position of the ball. It would identify the hot spot during the game and determine which direction to track by sending the control commands to the Blink Focos gimbal via bluetooth. Blink Focos system can distinguish between players and spectators and broadcast the game in live time.

settings.title: How to set it up?
settings.answer:
Please have the following ready before set up:

- Blink Focos Gimbal (purchase here)

- iPhone X or a newer model with iOS 14 or newer

- Blink Focos App (downloaded from Apple App store)

- Tripod (sold separately) or any other tripod with 1/4” head in screw

Put iPhone on Blink Focos gimbal, and setup the gimbal on a tripod on the side of the sports field. Open Blink Focos App, connect App with the gimbal, and then click the recording button and you can just relax. Blink Focos system will automatically track players, follow through the game, record it, and/or live stream it to whoever you want to share.


Note: we recommend the gimbal to be placed near the center line of the sports field. Otherwise, the tracking performance would be compromised.

settings.title: What sports can Blink Focos support?
settings.answer: Blink Focos can support basketball and soccer games. For basketball games, it supports half court and full court tracking. For soccer games, it supports 5x5, 7x7, 9x9, and 11x11 fields. It will  cover more team sports, and adding more features like smart video editing and recording with multiple cameras (Focos Pro).

settings.title: What phones Blink Focos can support?
settings.answer: Blink Focos supports iPhone X or a newer model with iOS 14 or newer. The support for Android phones is estimated to launch in the 3rd quarter of 2022. Please stay tuned.

settings.title: Do you support DSLR or mirrorless camera?
Can Blink Focos be used as a handheld stabilizer?
settings.answer: Yes. Even though Blink Focos is designed to follow and record team sport games automatically on a tripod, it can be doubled as a regular handheld stabilizer for any occasions as well. Download the Gimbal Pro app for more features.

settings.title: Where do you ship?
settings.answer: We are based in Mountain View, California, and we provide free shipping within U.S.. We provide international shipping with fees and deliver in about 5-8 business days.

settings.title: What is the product warranty and what’s the return policy?
settings.answer: Blink Focos provides 1-year warranty. We also provide 30-day money-back guarantee. Please check the return policy here for more details.

settings.title: What tripod should I use?
settings.answer:
If you are trying to record sports on a small field such as basketball court or 5v5 soccer field, you could choose our portable Blink tripod T1, which is about 4 feet tall and super easy to fold and unfold. 

On the other hand, if your goal is mainly for activities on a large filed such as 9v9 or 11v11 soccer, we highly recommend you use a 12 ft or taller tripod. It will give you a better tracking performance and a much better view angle. We are still working on Blink tripod T4 and it should be launched on US market early Oct. 

In both cases, the customized tripods should provide a great user experience. That being said, you could also choose a third-party tripod. Look for 1/4" screw in head. The majority of tripods on the market should support that and thus compatible with Focos gimbal.

settings.title: How does cloud storage work?
settings.answer: For now, we wouldn’t charge anything for the cloud storage. Feel free to upload your videos there and share with your families or friends.

settings.title: Can you do individual tracking?
settings.answer: Individual tracking in team sports is very challenging. But we understand that our users essentially want to make the camera focus more on a specific person of interest. We are interested in making this happen in the near future. Please stay tuned.

settings.title: How could I contribute?
settings.answer: You could let us know your feedback or even participate our Blink Beta program to help test new sports or new features. Email support@blinktech.us for more information.

settings.title: When will Android version come out?
settings.answer: We are working on it and are currently targeting at late November.

settings.title: Is there any subscription fees?
settings.answer: We don't charge subscription fee and there's no any hidden fees beyond the charge for the hardware.
